data.title: New on Netflix August 2024: A Good Girl's Guide to Murder , The Umbrella Academy Season 4, Emily in Paris Season 4 Part 1 & More
data.meta_description: Emily in Paris season 4 is also on the way. ü•ê
data.text:
¬© 2024 Netflix, Inc.

August, anyone? The new month means we're in the thick of summer, and there's tons new on Netflix in August 2024 for you to watch during those lazy, hazy, crazy last days of summer.

The first full week of August welcomes the arrival of the long-awaited two-part Director's Cut of Rebel Moon, the new movie in the SSU (Spongebob Squarepants Universe, duh) Saving Bikini Bottom: The Sandy Cheeks Movie, the United Kingdom edition of Love Is Blind, and the fourth and final season of The Umbrella Academy.

Related: What's Leaving Netflix August 2024? Movie & Show Removals

Later in the month even more movies and shows will be added to the streamer, like A Good Girl's Guide to Murder starring Wednesday's Emma Myers, based on the popular YA mystery crime trilogy written by Holly Jackson.

If you're already in a French mood thanks to the 2024 Paris Olympics, good news: Emily in Paris season 4 part 1 makes its grand entrance midway through the month (learn everything you need to know about the upcoming season here), along with Anne Rice's Immortal Universe series Mayfair Witches and Interview with the Vampire, Pop Star Academy: KATSEYE, KAOS starring Wicked's Jeff Goldblum, and The Deliverance starring King Richard's Demi Singleton and Stranger Things star Caleb McLaughlin.

Read More: KATSEYE on First Single ‚ÄòDebut,‚Äô Life After Pop Star Academy, & Their ‚ÄòSpecial‚Äô Bond

What better way to cap off the summer than with all this new content? Below, check out the complete list of everything new on Netflix in August 2024.
